name: test_e2e_with_logs[468_HHI_CACHE_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_CACHE_002` |
| **Name** | X-Host cache poisoning |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | cache_poisoning |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `X-Host: evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `X-Host%3A%20evil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:56:11.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected test_id=HHI_CACHE_002-1772268971109-3todde pattern_id=HHI_CACHE_002 uri=/?q=X-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
